description: After installing the security update for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 117.0.2045.55, users may experience performance issues such as slow loading times for web pages and lag during interactions with the browser. This is likely a consequence of the recent update addressing type confusion in V8 for CVE-2023-5346. It's essential for system administrators to monitor user feedback regarding the updated browser's responsiveness and stability to ensure a seamless browsing experience.
